DOC.brief_summary: This study determine impact 24 , 48 72 hour underfeeding energy expenditure measure metabolic chamber UNC Chapel Hill Nutrition Research Institute ( UNC NRI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Energy Expenditure Substrate Utilization During Acute Under- Over-feeding
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects complete baseline eucaloric study day . Following , subject randomize complete 3 day overfeed ( 150 % baseline eucaloric energy requirement ) 3 day underfeeding ( 50 % baseline eucaloric energy requirement ) . After complete one study arm , subject cross-over complete second arm . All study arm separate two week . 24-hour energy expenditure measure 3 time 3 day period . We hypothesize impact underfeeding EE evident 24-hours comparable 72 hour EE .
DOC.criteria: Woman Postmenopausal Aged 5065 year BMI 2535kg/m2 Not take blood pressure antiinflammatory medication medication may impact result Thyroid hormone profile within normal reference range No medical condition may impact result ( e.g . diabetes ) Accustomed eat regular meal include breakfast Smoker Heavy exerciser ( define > 150 minutes/week 3 month ) Abuses alcohol drug Vegetarian
